issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.summary: Network bridges can deadlock when memory limit exceeded

comments.body: Unit test that demonstrates the deadlock.  Since the test is based on a race condition, it is unlikely to fail unless TopicSubscription.acknowledge(...) is artifically delayed (see comments in ticket and attached TopicSubscription.java)
Includes some logging statements on TopicSubscription.add and an artificial delay on TopicSubscription.acknowledge

This is the output I get when I run the test case with the delayed TopicSubscription:
